High gas fees typically equal one thing: congestion. Too many trying to utilize the network simultaneously. 

Layer 2s (such as Arbitrum, Optimism, zkSync) and alternative chains (such as Solana, Avalanche) were designed to reduce fees by taking some pressure off Ethereum

Ten Protocol with other L2, what are the differences
👇👇👇

⚡ Other L2 (Arbitrum, Optimism, zkSync) = speed and scalability.

🕵️ Private L2s (Aztec) = confidential transactions.

🔐 Ten Protocol = encrypted smart contract execution, combining scalability with privacy.
